name: CyberPong (itch) (Bladertom)
description:
My first ever published game. 

A twist on the idea of what some consider to be the first game ever, CyberPong takes the tried-and-true formula of Pong, and adds a bit of agency to the players, as well as set it in a Cyberpunk enviroment.

Any and all feedback is appreciated.
